item.title: Sendmail says "domain does not exist"
item.description: Recently I set-up a machine in my closet to act as a backup server. One of it’s jobs is to download via pop3 all the email from our Gmail accounts just in case the cloud goes puf :). For this job I used fetchmail to fetch the emails to local users on the machine. All nice and simple … you’d think. The mail didn’t get delivered because sendmail complained about this error.
